concept.title: Adding a new community
concept.shortdesc: You can reconfigure and subsequently change the Sametime community connection information with connection information that your administrator provides.

conbody.p: The first time that you start the app and no communities configured, the app prompts you to setup a community. From the Welcome screen, you can scan a QR code or manually configure the app for your community.

After you configure your community, when you start the app, the Login screen opens. To manage existing communities or add a community, tap the arrow next to the community name. A list of your currently configured communities opens. From there you can tap a community name to edit it or tap the plus sign to add a community.
